text: Adriano Santos Spencer, known as Spencer (11 February 1959 – 24 November 2006) was a Cape Verdean football player of Cape Verdean descent. He played 6 seasons and 117 games in the Primeira Liga for Braga. He played one game for Benfica in the Taça de Portugal. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Braga on 30 August 1981 as a late substitute in a 1–0 victory over Rio Ave. ==References== ==External links== Category:1959 births Category:People from São Vicente, Cape Verde Category:Cape Verdean footballers Category:S.L. title: Adriano Spencer
